meanings.definition: Not belonging to or serving as a member of the cabinet.
meanings.sent1: The noncabinet members provided valuable input during the meeting.
meanings.sent2: It is important to consider noncabinet opinions when making decisions.
meanings.sent3: The noncabinet chairs were surprisingly comfortable.
meanings.sent4: Her noncabinet status allowed her to see things from a different perspective.
meanings.sent5: The noncabinet role was crucial in maintaining balance within the organization.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is not part of the cabinet.
meanings.sent1: The noncabinet was filled with various experts from different fields.
meanings.sent2: She was a noncabinet member but still had a significant impact on policies.
meanings.sent3: The noncabinet in the room seemed out of place among the official members.
meanings.sent4: Being a noncabinet allowed him to work independently on important projects.
meanings.sent5: The noncabinet brought fresh ideas and perspectives to the table.
